articles.title: Red Sox lose Alex Bregman to Cubs, who reportedly sign him to $175 million deal
articles.description:
The Red Sox were hoping to bring Bregman back to Boston, but lost out to Chicago.

The post Red Sox lose Alex Bregman to Cubs, who reportedly sign him to $175 million deal appeared first on Boston.com.
